TypeSignature.Value: public class ZipFile : Java.Lang.Object, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.IO.ICloseable

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ZipFile extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.IO.ICloseable, class System.IDisposable
type ZipFile = class inherit Object interface ICloseable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: This class is used to read entries from a zip file.

remarks.para: This class is used to read entries from a zip file.
Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a constructor or method in this class will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Java.IO.File file) cil managed

Docs.param: the ZIP file to be opened for reading
Docs.summary: Opens a ZIP file for reading given the specified File object.

remarks.para: Opens a ZIP file for reading given the specified File object.
The UTF-8 java.nio.charset.Charset charset is used to decode the entry names and comments.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: the name of the zip file
Docs.summary: Opens a zip file for reading.

remarks.para: Opens a zip file for reading.
First, if there is a security manager, its checkRead method is called with the name argument as its argument to ensure the read is allowed.
The UTF-8 java.nio.charset.Charset charset is used to decode the entry names and comments.
If the app targets Android U or above, zip file entry names containing ".." or starting with "/" passed here will throw a ZipException. For more details, see dalvik.system.ZipPathValidator.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Java.IO.File file, class Java.Nio.Charset.Charset charset) cil managed

Docs.param: the ZIP file to be opened for reading
The java.nio.charset.Charset charset to be used to decode the ZIP entry name and comment (ignored if the language encoding bit of the ZIP entry's general purpose bit flag is set).
Docs.summary: Opens a ZIP file for reading given the specified File object.

remarks.para: Opens a ZIP file for reading given the specified File object.
Added in 1.7.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Java.IO.File file, int32 mode) cil managed

Docs.param: the ZIP file to be opened for reading
the mode in which the file is to be opened
Docs.summary: Opens a new ZipFile to read from the specified File object in the specified mode.

remarks.para: Opens a new ZipFile to read from the specified File object in the specified mode. The mode argument must be either OPEN_READ or OPEN_READ | OPEN_DELETE.
First, if there is a security manager, its checkRead method is called with the name argument as its argument to ensure the read is allowed.
The UTF-8 java.nio.charset.Charset charset is used to decode the entry names and comments
Added in 1.3.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, class Java.Nio.Charset.Charset charset) cil managed

Docs.param: the name of the zip file
the java.nio.charset.Charset charset to be used to decode the ZIP entry name and comment that are not encoded by using UTF-8 encoding (indicated by entry's general purpose flag).
Docs.summary: Opens a zip file for reading.

remarks.para: Opens a zip file for reading.
First, if there is a security manager, its checkRead method is called with the name argument as its argument to ensure the read is allowed.
Added in 1.7.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public ZipFile (Java.IO.File? file, int mode, Java.Nio.Charset.Charset? charset);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Java.IO.File file, int32 mode, class Java.Nio.Charset.Charset charset) cil managed
new Java.Util.Zip.ZipFile : Java.IO.File * int * Java.Nio.Charset.Charset -> Java.Util.Zip.ZipFile

Docs.param: the ZIP file to be opened for reading
the mode in which the file is to be opened
the java.nio.charset.Charset charset to be used to decode the ZIP entry name and comment that are not encoded by using UTF-8 encoding (indicated by entry's general purpose flag).
Docs.summary: Opens a new ZipFile to read from the specified File object in the specified mode.

remarks.para: Opens a new ZipFile to read from the specified File object in the specified mode. The mode argument must be either OPEN_READ or OPEN_READ | OPEN_DELETE.
First, if there is a security manager, its checkRead method is called with the name argument as its argument to ensure the read is allowed.
Added in 1.7.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
abstract member Close : unit -> unit override this.Close : unit -> unit

remarks.para: Closes the ZIP file.
Closing this ZIP file will close all of the input streams previously returned by invocations of the #getInputStream getInputStream method.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns an input stream for reading the contents of the specified zip file entry.
Docs.returns: the input stream for reading the contents of the specified zip file entry.

remarks.para: Returns an input stream for reading the contents of the specified zip file entry.
Closing this ZIP file will, in turn, close all input streams that have been returned by invocations of this method.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Mode flag to open a zip file and mark it for deletion.

remarks.para: Mode flag to open a zip file and mark it for deletion. The file will be deleted some time between the moment that it is opened and the moment that it is closed, but its contents will remain accessible via the ZipFile object until either the close method is invoked or the virtual machine exits.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
